info.author: Devhouse Spindle
info.description:
Versionary
==========

|Build Status|

Package that allows to version code paths with the use of a decorator.

Status
------

Currently actively used and watched.

Usage
-----

Requirements
~~~~~~~~~~~~

-  python 2.7
-  python 3.3, 3.4, 3.5

Installation
~~~~~~~~~~~~

::

    pip install versionary

Running
~~~~~~~

Usage 1.

.. code:: python


    from versionary.decorators import versioned

    @versioned()
    def my_func():
        return 1

    @versioned()
    def my_func__v2:
        return 2

    one = my_func.v1()
    two = my_func.v2()

Usage 2.

.. code:: python

    @versioned(1)
    def my_func():
        return 1

    @versioned(2)
    def my_func:
        return 2

    one = my_func.v1()
    two = my_func.v2()

You can use the validate\_module function from versionary.utils to
validate correct use of the decorator in the given module.

Contributing
------------

file on how to contribute to this project.
